entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
